name: Drillbur's Winter Outreach
description:
My third solo project. A short and simple platformer game, this time consisting of three sections. Drillbur is back on an outreach mission to protect the weak from oppressors and nurse them back to health. (He does not keep treasure to himself you know!)

Music: "Powering Up" by Michael Robinson HomingStar, "Winter Feeling" by Tom Peter
